entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source generators are introducing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis prebuilts in source-build #71741
  • SIGSEGV with disposing of DSA keys concurrently on macOS #71738
  • Merge the remaining groups of runtime tests #71732
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Debugger gets `scriptParsed` events for wrappers/generated functions with url `http://mono-wasm.invalid/...` #71727
  • GetCurrentProcessorId may cause non-deterministic asm diffs #71723
  • [API Proposal]: Support Custom Data on `JsonSerializerOptions` #71718
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializerOptions copy constructor should include the metadata resolver #71716
    7.0.0
  • X509Chain build sometimes return PartialChain for valid certificate on Linux #71715
    Future
  • Remove implicit fallback to reflection-based serialization in System.Text.Json sourcegen #71714
    7.0.0
  • Building the Cross-Targeting Tools fails on FreeBSD-amd64 host for ARM64 target #71713
  • CORINFO_FLG_CUSTOMLAYOUT semantics #71711
  • Application Crash #71708
  • Deadlock SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync/Release when call Release and Dispose from another Task #71706
  • An extra prompt dialog display during testing ASP.Net symbols on VS 17.4 preview 1 #71704
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\LocallocCnstB1_d\\LocallocCnstB1_d.cmd #71702
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.SslClientAuthenticationOptionsExtensions #71697
  • Test failure System.IO.Pipes.Tests.AnonymousPipeTest_CrossProcess.ServerClosesPipe_ClientReceivesEof #71692

Closed

  • Use TypedReference as argument with a delegate will crash #42732
    7.0.0
  • ECMA 335 is unclear about Array.Initialize() #71733
  • HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation() fails to throw OperationCanceledException #67880
  • Additional diagnostics for .NET 6 #56072
    Future
  • Investigate adding common Linux crypto algorithms #15936
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates test failures #70320
  • Regressions due to Roslyn update #67914
    7.0.0
  • CryptographicException in System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.Tests.PEBuilderTests.Checksum test #70128
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.NothingRevoked #70323
  • Some MonoTargetsTasks project references are not removed during source build #69460
    7.0.0
  • PlaintextMVC benchmark is slow on arm64 #60166
    7.0.0
  • CURDLE and Cryptographic algorithm APIs / selection #15875
    Future
  • Net50 SortedSet<string>.add do not add items to the collection #71643
  • Prefer ExactSpelling=true on [DllImport] for known APIs #35695
    8.0.0
  • RSACryptoServiceProvider.KeySize setter not respected #18863
    Future
  • Consider integration with third party incremental hash algorithms #19709
    Future
  • OpenSslCryptographicException initialising an X509Certificate2 on Ubuntu 14.04 or official docker image microsoft/aspnetcore:1.1.0 #20173
    Future
  • Invalid key size exception could helpfully list valid key sizes #21849
    Future
  • DoesSignatureUseSafeCanonicalizationMethod fails when doing multiple concurrent CheckSignature #26375
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography libraries should conform to interop guidelines #51564
    7.0.0
  • Crypto interop needs to be consolidated under src\Common\src\Interop\ #26541
    Future
  • Opensuse Tumbleweed - No usable version of the libssl was found #27113
    Future
  • On x64 platform, "stelem.ref" ignores high bits of "native int" index #52817
    7.0.0
  • Prefer Dictionary<K, V>.TryAddValue(key) over guarded Add(key) #33799
    7.0.0
  • PGO: Static profile affects loop alignment where it's not supposed to do #71649
    8.0.0
  • AV in Interop+crypt32.PFXExportCertStore #30048
    Future
  • Refactor/upgrade deprecated code usage for Mac OSX 10.15 Crypthography #30489
    Future
  • Unable to run dotnet-ilverify on Apple M1 #70508
    Future
  • Out of bounds error with CryptoStream.Write using FromBase64Transform #30993
    Future
  • Several System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs tests fail with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException #31281
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: TarReader should not assume same format for all entries in a tar file #69544
    7.0.0
  • X509Certificate2 with Private Key without User Profile not possible on Windows #59329
    Future
  • RevokeEndEntityWithInvalidRevocationName failed #65421
  • Source-build does not include Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetHostResolver in .NET 7.0 #71689
  • BinaryData Method ToObjectFromJson Does Not Properly Handle BOM #71447
  • Assertion failed '(shiftAmount == scale) || (shiftAmount == 0)' #71684
  • GC slow since .net 7 Preview 5/6/7 somewhere. #71627
    7.0.0
  • R2R: add a bit that indicates whether IBC data was used when producing the code #13631
    7.0.0
  • crossgen2 fails to compile dlls on armel with versionbubble after compilation of ILCompiler.ReadyToRun.dll #55663
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Features/SustainedLowLatency/scenario/scenario.sh #63858
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\22021\\consumer\\consumer.cmd #69224
  • .NET 6 R2R does not work with classes with umlauts in referenced assemblies #63193
    7.0.0
  • .NET6 performance issue (compared to .NET5) #63621
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Invoke\\fptr\\ftn_t_il_r\\ftn_t_il_r.cmd #66183
  • Assembly.Load will throw System.IO.FileNotFoundException #62522
  • Test failure GC/API/GCHandle/Alloc_neg2/Alloc_neg2.sh #66626
  • Test failure: profiler\\unittest\\getappdomainstaticaddress\\getappdomainstaticaddress.cmd #67679
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest942\\Generated942\\Generated942.cmd #61391
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/TotalMemory2/TotalMemory2.sh #63860
  • system.text.regularexpressions.tests Failing on ARM64 linux #71722
  • Instantiation over object aborts devirtualization #51974
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/regressions/dev10_568786/4_Misc/Variance2/Variance2.sh #53488
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd_v2/dlbigleakthd_v2.sh #66643
  • Test failure GC\\Coverage\\LargeObjectAlloc2\\LargeObjectAlloc2.cmd #66566
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_487702/DevDiv_487702/DevDiv_487702.sh #66377
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Regression\\GitHub_47236\\GitHub_47236\\GitHub_47236.cmd #66570
  • Test failure GC/Coverage/LargeObjectAlloc2/LargeObjectAlloc2.sh #66567
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/basics/tryfaulttrycatch_il_d/tryfaulttrycatch_il_d.sh #66050
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\cctor\\simple\\precise1_cs_do\\precise1_cs_do.cmd #65350
  • Test failure readytorun\\crossgen2\\crossgen2smoke\\crossgen2smoke.cmd #63004
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest222\\Generated222\\Generated222.cmd #61647
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\hugeexpr1\\hugeexpr1.cmd #61825
  • Different behavior across .NET versions when testing objects for type of IntPtr / nint typed array #63933
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsTest/GenericsTest.sh #61300
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\Allocation\\largeexceptiontest\\largeexceptiontest.cmd #63857
  • Test failure System.Threading.Tests.PeriodicTimerTests.PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted #65043
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread\\GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread.cmd #63717
  • Test failure threading.NamedMutex.test1 #60383
  • "Cannot print exception string because Exception.ToString() failed." should include type #39910
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest1082\\Generated1082\\Generated1082.cmd #61082
  • Test failure System.Threading.Tests.ThreadLocalTests.RunThreadLocalTest5_Dispose #60997
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/interactions/throw1dimarray_r/throw1dimarray_r.sh #60898
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\GCBench\\gcbench\\gcbench.cmd #60850
  • Crossgen2 produced by x86 runtime build crashes compilation due to the absence of "jitinterface_x64" #47388
    7.0.0
  • Access checks in JIT interface methods #13392
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests Generate code assertion failure #71720
  • Method binding by name with Type.DefaultBinder.BindToMethod fails with specific condition #66237
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add generic version of System.Text.Json.JsonSerializableAttribute #71712
  • error when build mono release/6.0 branch on MacCatalyst os #71614
  • JSON flaky tests #67761
    8.0.0
  • Widespread regressions after #71498 (Spans to use ref fields) #71667
    7.0.0
  • ILVerify throws System.BadImageFormatException on invoke #71688
  • double Microsoft.UI.Input.PointerPoint.Position should be int #71665
  • AppBarButton PointerPressed Event doesn't fire #71681
  • System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider produces different results depending on the runtime version #71694
  • JIT: Invalid result computed with modulo operation #71600
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Close PGO data file when done with it reliably #71744
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove GeneratePackageOnBuild missed on branding PR #71743
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Improve objcopy detection #71742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mix newer kernel versions into library test matrix #71740
    area-Meta
  • Always expand "obj is ExactClass" even in cold blocks #71739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid calling mono_metadata_type_hash () on the container clas… #71734
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix debugging on Mac and iOS #71731
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixing public field order for System.Numerics types #71728
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Preparatory changes for enabling direct decomposition of promoted locals into `FIELD_LIST`s on ARM #71726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle stateless collection marshalling with non-blittable elements #71724
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading
  • Stop throwing when attempting to validate a JObject. #71717
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix incoming arg struct splitting #71701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for OAEP encryption with non-power-of-two key sizes #71699
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix RSA OAEP decryption in Android with non-power-of-two key lengths #71696
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-android
  • Better error handling in SubtleCrypto workers #71693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security

Merged

  • TypedByReference should be treated as a normal valuetype for calling convention purposes #71675
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add note about partition IV and V to ECMA-335 augments #71737
  • Update branding to 6.0.8 #71668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Leverage compiler attributes for snippets identification #71729
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Check for V2 shapes on string marshallers #71730
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Exclude AssemblyStripper from source-build #71691
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JSON tests for creating recursive types with contract resolver #71721
    area-System.Text.Json
  • On 64 bit platforms, "stelem.ref" and "ldelema" ignore the high bits of a native int index #71571
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adjust weights of blocks with profile inside loops in non-profiled methods #71659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix debugging on Mac and iOS #71436
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Mark ILVerify as AnyCPU #71695
    area-ILVerification
  • Re-create profile data on profile-use-only mode #71420
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add host.pkg to DefaultHostSubsets #71690
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow UTF-8 BOM in BinaryData When Deserializing #71457
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Integrate mibc mono config extension #71657
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for JsonGenerator). #71653
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix S.R.InteropServices remarks #71683
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Use OS-provided RSA OAEP implementation for Android #71670
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [wasm] WBT: Enable playwright based tests #71602
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • DefaultBinder named parameter support skipping default parameters #71013
    area-System.Reflection
  • Update design and expose new attributes for the CustomTypeMarshaller support #71682
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Don't set CORINFO_FLG_CUSTOMLAYOUT for auto-layout structs #71673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify JsonPropertyInfo list implementation and expose IsExtensionData properties #71650
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • (NativeAOT) Re-enable Linux System.Reflection tests after fix #71664
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use in-tree ilasm to run test suite natively on s390x #71326
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix generating unrepresentable nullchecks on ARM64 #71687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify CEEInfo::getTypeForPrimitiveValueClass #71686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid reordering operands in fgMorphModToSubMulDiv #71615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable a test for ilasm roundtripping #71634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use crypto.subtle for AES on Browser WASM #71501
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Hold stop-go lock when requesting CCW #71660
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [WIP]Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode an intrinsic #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Using /unicode when running ildasm.exe roundtrip tests #71163
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ask SChannel for stapled OCSP when the client will do revocation #71570
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Unix arm64 atomics #71512
    arch-arm64, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #71652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add an ETW event for reporting richer debug information back #71263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LoggingGenerator). #71651
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add a fabricbot task to add issues to the AppModel project #71672
    area-Meta
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Double to Decimal Conversion Refactor (WIP) #70602
    area-System.Numerics
  • Updating a few BitConverter APIs to be intrinsic #71567
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Less aggressive `stfld` spilling #71663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix `ldelem[a]/stelem/cpobj/ldobj/stobj <pointer type>` import #71679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix long latencies in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` lock operations due to `Sleep(1)` #70165
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add an Azure NPM registry #71393
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiChar intrinsic on AArch64 #71637
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Tar, Zip: respect umask when creating files. #71647
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Update ILToNativeMap event to include IL version #71479
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Redist #71573
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Redesign the hot cold mapping data structure to allow fast lookup #1903

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support EH funclet splitting in Crossgen2 #1926

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Testhost.exe does not find '7.0.0-preview.6.22324.4' runtime when running tests #26462
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure struct fields follow LayoutKind #26460
  • Azure Dev ops msbuild failing for package of .net 6.0 Service fabric project with error in Microsoft.NET.Publish.targets #26459
  • Define precedence relationship with MSBuild properties and CLI args #26447
  • Improve RID and `publish` UX #26446
  • Enable publishing a self-contained app with `PublishSelfContained` #26445
  • Enable publishing for a RID with `PublishRuntimeIdentifier` #26444

Closed

  • Enable publishing as `Release` with `PublishRelease` #23551
    7.0.1xx
  • Support flowing workload dependencies through project and package dependencies #24205
    6.0.4xx
  • Log the WebPublishMethod #26283
  • The " GenerateDepsFile" Task failed unexpectedly #26315
  • Create FabricBot rule for compat issues #26166
    7.0.1xx
  • SDK 6.0.301 breaks clean build with LibLog package #26404

PullRequests

Created

  • Update loc build to main #26464
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch loc build to main #26463
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add --info Option to Workload Base Command For Future Triage #26458
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26420
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log the publish method used when publishing #26287
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Revert to token-per-line response file handling #26204
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 6.0.303
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1862266 #26442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remoev the build retry and increase the test retry #26439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum vs version to 17.2 #24438
  • Simplify caching logic to not try and retain caches between supression #26367
  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri (#25420) #26448
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #26441
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce System.Runtime.TieredPGO knob #26350
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove all of the extra run helix tests scripts for running non-helix… #26438
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet sln add for older 4.7.2 projects wrong configuration #26329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: May 2022 CTL #26403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Consume the razor source generator via nuget package #26399
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26440
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set
  • readonly members on interfaces #3055
  • Champion "Query-foreach (`do` query termination)" #101
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Re-organize doc #6258

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SourceProductionContext and GeneratorExecutionContext should share a common interface for AddSource() #62439
  • Convert 'Program' to 'Main' with `file partial class Program` #62437
  • New Stack Trace Explorer only works with English stack traces #62436
  • Specifying `file` class as generic constraints crashes the compiler with NRE #62435
  • Improve error recovery for `partial file class` #62434
  • Investigate a niche 'required' scenario where the compiler overrides a property from IL #62426
    Backlog
  • 'required' isn't offered in records #62421
  • When `csharp_prefer_braces = true:error` build doesn't fail as expected. #62418
  • Revise and combine `GetSymbolModifiers` and `DeclarationModifiers.From` implementation #62416
  • 'Extract base class' doesn't work well for records #62415
  • Can Source Generators support dotnet6? #62414
  • Support 'file' modifier in "IDE0036: Order modifiers" analyzer #62407

Closed

  • Switch expression using pattern matching on floating point values reports wrong result for double.Nan #62241
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash with type parameter on type constrained to file-local type #62448
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump the integration test timeouts a bit #62446
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties and items #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Filter trees to only those containing global-usings or attributes prior to analyzing them. #62444
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add link to detailed map of VS and SDK versions #62438
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Run EndToEnd tests in a more isolated/controlled environment #62433
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Make more command handlers synchronous (#62086)" #62432
    Area-IDE
  • Suggested simplifications to the incremental generator codebase. #62427
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove dead code from code generation service #62417
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Complete 'file' support for `SyntaxGenerator` #62413
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62409
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Find the right symbol when following type forwards #62406
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Generate SBOM for VS components #62447
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62441
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62443
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62442
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • faster git checkout #62255
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Skip the balanced switch dispatch optimization for patterns on floating-point inputs #62322
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Reuse prior TableEntry values in the increment NodeTable builder if possible. #62320
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Test helpers shouldn't escape quotes by default #62321
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62431
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62428
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow OmniSharp options to surface through LegacyGlobalOptions #62405
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62394
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62423
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62425

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR Core Nuget Package is deprecated? #42601
  • Address dotnet-user-jwts prebuilt in source-build #42599
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] Unhandled exception rendering component: The given key was not present in the dictionary. #42598
  • Support disabling auto-registering auth middlewares in WAB #42596
    7.0-preview7
  • ProtectedLocalStorage cannot be mocked for unit tests #42594
  • Expose RoutePatternFactory.Combine #42593
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add APIs to make it possible for users of RouteEndpointBuilder to use filters #42592
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Rename filter extension methods and type name to be more agnostic #42589

Closed

  • Multiple login page for redirect #42531
    Discussions
  • NuGet: Authentication packages versioning #42566
  • Blazor: support webpack module federation flow #42486
  • Can't open multiple windows from blazor server. #42570
  • Add `ObjectHttpResult` likes the `ObjectResult` #41470
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Clean up output spew when creating token and secret for the first time #42474
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Add message type resolver #42428

  • Reduce console spew when creating secrets in user-jwts #42542

  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `548b13d` to `96f5142` #42528
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Update newtonsoft.json dependency #42377
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Remove old unused Docker files #42246
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Remove old unused Docker files #42245
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Remove support for setting default scheme from user-jwts #42578
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Remove Authentication property from WebApplicationBuilder and fix up middleware auto-registration #42585

    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix Shell tests on CI for iOS #8568
    6.0-servicing
  • [Proposal] Show progress of issue on GitHub #8566
  • Non removable forced padding on each ListViewItem #8564
    6.0.300
  • Border shadow leaks memory and eventually crashes the app (Android) #8563

    6.0-sr3
  • Essentials should work in Windows Unpackaged apps #8552
    6.0-sr3
  • Debugging and error logging on VS Mac and Blazor MAUI #8551

Closed

  • Adorner layer does not display anything for MAUI+WinUI #8096
    6.0-sr2
  • Buttons (or clicking) don't seem to work properly in scrollviews #8446
    6.0-sr3
  • Android - Excessive space on the right side of Grid #7221
    6.0-servicing
  • FlexLayout exception #7824
    6.0-servicing

  • ScrollView and window size #7774

    6.0-sr3
  • ScrollView not auto resizing #7374
    6.0-sr3
  • ScrollView layout not updating when child IsVisible is updated #7322
    6.0-sr3
  • ScrollView doesn't work properly on Android. #7590
    6.0-sr3
  • Windows Entry with Text (Child of Frame) causes freeze #8529
  • MAC OS running new X509Certificate2() failed with error The PKCS#12 Exportable flag is not supported on this platform. #8547

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some ScrollView rotation issues on iOS #8570

  • Remove validation exceptions Slider min/max values #8560
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1245.22 to 1.0.1264.42 #8550
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update SGen to add "NET6_0_OR_GREATER" instead of NET5 #8548
    area/architecture, .NET 7

Merged

  • Replace Newtonsoft.Json dependency with System.Text.Json in Resizetizer #8539
    area/single project ☝️
  • Capture UI context when triggering UI actions #8555
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄, .NET 7
  • More Unpackaged Support #8536
  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Changed default Border StrokeShape value #8521
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr3
  • Call UpdateEmptyView when switching adapters #8522

  • Propagate appearing/disappearing/deactivated #8542

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot Add Custom Foreign Key #28376

Closed

  • ForeignKeyPropertyDiscoveryConvention doesn't trigger when a shadow property is added that matches the property created implicitly #25830
    7.0.0
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold works fine when executed from command line, but not when executed from code #28333
  • Regression in 6.0.2: The variable name '@p0' has already been declared. #27427
    6.0.8

PullRequests

Created

Merged
